name: Mocha Optimizing Compiler
description: Compiler that parses and type-checks a custom language, lowers it to CFG/TAC IR, converts to SSA, runs optimization passes (CF, CP, CPP, DCE, CSE, OFE), performs SSA elimination + register allocation, and emits executable DLX machine code.

name: Distributed X Clone
description: A fault-tolerant distributed X clone with heartbeat-based leader election via a Coordinator, master/follower server pairs per cluster, and RabbitMQ+synchronizers replicating users, follows, and timelines across clusters. gRPC powers client APIs and bidirectional timeline streaming.

name: TCP over UDP
description: Application-layer implementation of a connection-oriented protocol over a connectionless one. Emulates flow control, congestion control, RTT estimation, fast retransmits, and more, achieving over 1 Gbps throughput with threading.

name: MiniOS
description: A basic operating system built on QEMU with virtual memory, multithreading, hardware drivers, and a file system. Required knowledge of memory paging, thread scheduling, device I/O, storage, and x86 Assembly.

name: A Simple Ray Tracer
description: Simulates light behavior to accurately reproduce shadows, reflections, and material interactions. Built with C++, the program calculates light paths for each pixel to create lifelike visuals.

name: 16 Bit CPU
description: Designed a 16-bit CPU in with a custom instruction set using HDL and Nand2Tetris. Built ALU, program counter, dissasembler, registers, and memory with basic AND, OR, NOT gates.
